subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ defense is still ranked No. 1 in the N.F.L., despite recording no sacks and yielding 48 points and 493 yards to the Saints in a loss last week.
snippet: The Giants’ defense is still ranked No. 1 in the N.F.L., despite recording no sacks and yielding 48 points and 493 yards to the Saints in a loss last week.
